    • createDetailButton

      public void createDetailButton(Issue issue, boolean openIssue)
      Creates a new detail button and sets its onAction to load the issue detail scene.
      Parameters:
      issue - open or closed issue which will have this button assigned to its corresponding field.
      openIssue - true if issue is an open one, false otherwise.
